tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery,Maxillo Facial Treatment,Oral Rehabilitation,Presurgical Orthodontics,
review:
we have been consulting doctor from last 4 years.  he has done 5 surgieries already for my son.  he is the best doctor in the town , in India , and in the world when it comes cranio facial surgeries, lefort surgeries, orthodontic surgeries...
as always he is calm, patience, listen to all the queries, nd answers them.
he is not behind money as such as we generally see in bangalore, and more importantlly, having right and good skill sets with tons of experiences.
probably he is done more than 2000 such surgeries so far.
more ever he is good human being with good gratitude and fantastic smile and attitude.
I recommend him for all dental, cranio facial, any kind of austhetic related surgeries.

Very Humble and makes us comfortable.
He explains the problem and causes clearly.  I went for consultation for TMJ issue

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is a simple and humble doctor with great intellect and experience.He explains the procedure details very well. Even though he is a very busy doctor he finds time to respond for my doubts.The doctor's colleagues are also friendly and well experienced.
